tool_description: Validates stock availability for multiple product-quantity pairs simultaneously, providing comprehensive validation results for shopping carts or bulk orders.

validation_mode.description: Validation mode: strict (all must be available) or flexible (partial fulfillment allowed)

customer_session_id.description: Customer session ID for reservation context

ignore_existing_reservations.description: Ignore existing reservations for this customer session

consolidate_shipments.description: Attempt to fulfill from single warehouse when possible

max_backorder_days.description: Maximum days to wait for backordered items

include_substitutions.description: Include product substitutions in validation results

priority_products.description: Product IDs to prioritize in allocation

error_messages: Invalid product_quantities format: Each item must be 'product_id:quantity' format
Batch size exceeded: Maximum 200 product-quantity pairs allowed per batch
Invalid validation_mode: Must be either 'strict' or 'flexible'
Session ID required: customer_session_id cannot be empty
Invalid warehouse preference: One or more warehouse IDs are invalid
Invalid backorder days: max_backorder_days must be between 0 and 365
Too many priority products: Maximum 50 products can be marked as priority
usage: Provide an array of product_id:quantity pairs and customer_session_id. Configure validation behavior with validation_mode, warehouse_preference, and other optional parameters to control fulfillment logic.

overall_status.description: Overall validation status: available, partial, or unavailable

validated_items.description: Array of validation results for each product

total_available_value.description: Total dollar value of available items

fulfillment_warehouses.description: List of warehouses needed for complete fulfillment

estimated_ship_date.description: ISO 8601 estimated ship date for the entire batch
